translation.en: [Adam] With that filing system?
Shocking. It should all be online.
The minute I find myself with a few extra hours, I will set up those accounts.
Until then, this is how your dad did it.
Hey, grab a pile.
Sorry. I gotta get to my room to think about what I've done.
translation.ko: 죄송해요, 방에 가서 제 잘못을 반성해야 돼요

translation.en: Okay.
I gotta go.
Call me if you need me.
[Adam] I won't.
Mom's gone to work.
-Dad's favorite song. -♪ There's only one thing ♪
-♪ Gonna set you free… ♪ -Yeah, me too.
-♪ That's my love… ♪ -See, we agreed on something. -Maybe the only thing. -♪ That's my love… ♪
translation.ko: 우리도 통하는 게 있었네 또 있을진 모르겠지만

translation.en: -♪ Let my love open the door… ♪ -What?
-I just… You're… kinda ripped. -♪ Let my love open the door ♪
-♪ When everything feels… ♪ -Okay.
Do you work out?
-My genetics don't… -Ever have a thought and not let it out?
translation.ko: 말하지 말고 생각만 하면 안 될까?

translation.en: Could be fun to just keep it in.
Maybe in the future, there's, like… like, gene therapy or nanotechnology for--
translation.ko: 미래에는 유전자 치료나 나노 기술 같은 게 있는지…

translation.en: -Don't do it. Don't… don't do it. -♪ Let my love open the door ♪
-♪ Let my love open the door… ♪ -So when does… all this happen.
Does everyone skip leg day in the future?
translation.ko: 미래 사람들은 다들 하체 운동 걸러요?

translation.en: -♪ To your heart… ♪ -Does it happen in college?
Oh, wait. Do we get a lot of girls in college?
-I-- -Adam, time travel exists.
[laughs] It exists. Isn't that crazy?
Every conceptual idea you have about the universe
translation.ko: 네가 우주에 대해 알고 있던 모든 이론이

translation.en: has just been thrown out the window. Yet your big question is, "Do I get laid?"
translation.ko: 송두리째 뒤집혔는데 고작 여자랑 자는지가 궁금해?

translation.en: -Do I? -[Adam] Jesus Christ.
-I was just wondering. -[Adam] Wonder in silence.
-♪ Let my love open the door ♪ -Oh my God! It's gonna happen!
-Where you goin'? -Drugstore.
I need to get this wound closed up.
You're gonna go dressed like that?
Why don't you wear some of Dad's clothes?
How long ago was Dad's accident?
About a year and a half ago.
She still hasn't cleaned out his closet.
She's not much of a housekeeper.
Hey. You have her to take care of you. She has no one. You understand?
translation.ko: 야 엄마 돌봐줄 사람은 너밖에 없어, 알겠어?

translation.en: Do you understand?
She wakes up every morning
translation.ko: 엄마는 매일 아침 찢어지는 마음으로 일어나서

translation.en: with a broken heart and a closet full of his clothes
translation.ko: 엄마는 매일 아침 찢어지는 마음으로 일어나서 아빠의 옷장을 보고 네 헛소리나 받아주는데

translation.en: and gets nothing from you but a fistful of crap,
translation.ko: 아빠의 옷장을 보고 네 헛소리나 받아주는데

translation.en: and not even, like, ten seconds of genuine empathy.
I'm you, you know.
Tell me about it.
You know, 30 years, you still get sick to your stomach
every time you remember how you treated her now.
translation.ko: 엄마한테 한 짓을 생각하면 구역질이 나

translation.en: I used to love this jacket.
Dad did too.
I keep waiting to wake up and miss him less,
translation.ko: 아빠가 덜 그리워지는 날을 기다리고 있는데

translation.en: but that hasn't happened yet.
Do you still miss him?
Missed him while he was here.
-It's not gonna fit you. -Sure it will.
-[bleeping] -[young Adam] How's the jet?
It's gettin' there.
So the person you came to save is in 2018.
And somehow, you ended up in 2022. How does that work? You just missed?
Well, I got shot when I was stealing the plane.
So, uh… I was losin' blood. Ship was comin' apart.
translation.ko: 피는 잔뜩 흐르지 우주선은 고장 났지

translation.en: I jammed the coordinates. I didn't have time to double-check 'em.
translation.ko: 좌표를 잘못 적었는데 확인할 겨를이 없었어

translation.en: -Wait, you stole the jet? -It's encoded to me.
So I didn't exactly steal it. I borrowed the shit out of it.
translation.ko: 그러니 훔친 게 아니라 내 맘대로 빌린 셈이지

translation.en: -There's a difference. Give me some cash. -You don't have money?
translation.ko: 다른 거야, 돈 좀 줘봐 - 돈도 없어요? - 미래에는 돈이 없어

translation.en: -We don't use money in the future. -Really?
translation.ko: - 돈도 없어요? - 미래에는 돈이 없어 진짜요?

translation.en: Of course we use money in the future. Stay here.
[Chuck laughs] What's up, Reed?
Crap.
Well, look who we have here.
Ray, can we just take a break from the ass kicking today?
translation.ko: 레이, 오늘은 주먹 좀 쉬게 하면 안 될까?

translation.en: I have a lot going on.
Hey, guys. Enjoying our suspension?
translation.ko: 얘들아, 정학 기간은 즐겁게 보내고 있지?

translation.en: I am now.
[young Adam groans] That's my spleen.
I remember these little turd-burpers.
-Hey, man, we're, uh… just playin' around. -Quiet, Ray. This isn't about you.
translation.ko: 그냥 같이 노는 중이에요 조용히 해, 레이 넌 주인공이 아니야

translation.en: Chuck.
Hey, what's goin' on? Huh?
Get it together. Ray's ready. You're embarrassing yourself.
translation.ko: 정신 똑바로 차려 레이는 준비됐는데 뭔 망신이니

translation.en: So you're not gonna break this up?
God, no. That'd be irresponsible of me.
translation.ko: 말리기는! 그런 무책임한 짓을 왜 해?

translation.en: You'll just figure out some other way to pound the crap out of him.
translation.ko: 말려봤자 다른 방법으로 두들겨 팰 거 다 알아

translation.en: You always do.
He's got a big mouth. I get it.
Point is, this fight needs to happen right now.
translation.ko: 어쨌든 너희는 지금 꼭 싸워야만 해

translation.en: So just give us a second, okay, Ray?
Stretch out. You don't wanna pull a hammy.
translation.ko: 스트레칭하고 있어 근육 놀라면 큰일 난다

translation.en: What are you doing?
Hey, Ray Dollarhyde has been bullying you for years
translation.ko: 저놈은 네가 작고, 연약하고 수다쟁이라는 이유로

translation.en: because you're small, and fragile, and you have a big mouth.
translation.ko: 저놈은 네가 작고, 연약하고 수다쟁이라는 이유로 한참을 너를 괴롭혀 왔지만 쟤도 싸움을 원치 않아

translation.en: But here's the thing. He doesn't wanna fight.
translation.ko: 한참을 너를 괴롭혀 왔지만 쟤도 싸움을 원치 않아

translation.en: -I don't wanna fight either. -He doesn't know that, does he?
translation.ko: - 저도 싸우기 싫어요! - 쟤는 그걸 모르잖아!

translation.en: So you're gonna walk over there, and you're gonna raise your hands,
translation.ko: 그러니까 쟤한테 가서 두 주먹 높이 들고

translation.en: and then you're gonna look Ray right in the eye.
You're gonna smile in a way that says,
"I've waited my entire life for this moment."
translation.ko: 평생 이 순간을 기다려 왔다는 듯이

translation.en: Like you can't wait to watch his soul exit his body.
translation.ko: 저놈 영혼이 가출하는 장면을 보고 싶다는 듯이

translation.en: Then you're gonna drop to your knees
and punch him hard in the private bathing suit parts.
-I'm sorry, the what now? -Ah! Are we gonna smoke this banana?
translation.ko: 뭐라고요? 얘기는 이쯤 하고 바나나 껍질 까러 갈까?

translation.en: Or are we gonna talk about it all day? Let's go, go, go, go, go.
translation.ko: 얘기는 이쯤 하고 바나나 껍질 까러 갈까? 이리 와

translation.en: I'm gonna smoke your banana, motherf--
translation.ko: 네 바나나 껍질을 까주마, 이 개…

translation.en: No, no, no, no! No. That… that's not what we talked about.
-[groans] -[Ray] Boom! [laughing] Oh yeah!
-[Chuck] Nice, man. -[Ray] You crying, Reed?
Oh no, Chuck. Look, we made him cry.
[Chuck] It's like he was trying to lose.
Run away, Reed!
-What the hell? -I'm not supposed to do this.
Ever hear the expression, "Every bully has a bully"?
translation.ko: 이 말 들어봤어? '누구나 못살게 구는 사람이 있다'

translation.en: Yours isn't holding up his end of the bargain, so I'm gonna take over.
translation.ko: 널 담당하는 녀석이 제 역할을 못 하니까 내가 대신 나서주지

translation.en: -What are you talking about? -[shushes]
You're a good fighter. You like to kick ass. You're a big kid.
translation.ko: 넌 덩치 크고, 싸움 잘하고 애들 괴롭히기를 좋아하지만

translation.en: But if you go near Adam again, I'll know, and I will find you, Ray.
translation.ko: 한 번 더 애덤을 건드리면 내가 널 찾아갈 거야, 레이

translation.en: And it won't be like a couple of kids in a playground scrap.
translation.ko: 놀이터 애들 싸움쯤은 우습게 만들어 줄게

translation.en: I will pull bones out of your body.
I will sharpen them.
-I will use them to stab little Chuckie. -What did I do?
translation.ko: - 그걸로 척을 찌를 거야 - 저는 왜요?

translation.en: Shut your mouth, or I'll fill it with Ray's feet.
translation.ko: 안 닥치면 입에 레이 발 쑤셔 넣는다

translation.en: You understand what I'm saying? Got all of it? The bones?
translation.ko: 내 말 알아들었어? 뼈 바르는 거랑 척 입에 발 넣는 거 들었지?

translation.en: -Yeah. -Your feet in Chuckie's mouth?
translation.ko: 뼈 바르는 거랑 척 입에 발 넣는 거 들었지?

translation.en: -[liquid running] -Good. Are you peeing right now? -Yeah. -You're a real streamer.
translation.ko: 좋아, 지금 오줌 싸니? 오줌보가 크네

translation.en: Get yourself home and clean yourself up.
Be the change you wanna see, okay?
God, I hated those assholes.
Oh, come on.
Hey, Adam.
Get out of my stuff and open the door.
Put the drone down. It will kill us both.
translation.ko: 드론 내려놔, 그러다 둘 다 죽어

translation.en: Hey, look, you lost one fight. I figured you'd be used to that by now.
translation.ko: 고작 싸움 한 번 진 거야 익숙해질 때도 되지 않았어?

translation.en: You coulda helped. You just stood there.
Christ. You're so sensitive.
Hey, you had to lose that fight.
You had to. Trust me.
You don't go from bein' you to bein' me without gettin' your ass kicked,
translation.ko: 두들겨 맞는 일이 없으면 네가 나처럼 될 것 같아?

translation.en: a lot, all the time.
I'm sorry if I went too far today.
Shouldn't have done that.
-[young Adam] Who's this? -Who's who?
Put that back.
You put that back.
As soon as you tell me who she is.
That's my wife, Laura.
We have a wife?
No, we do not have a wife anymore.
-[Ellie] Hey. -Hi.
-[man] Aah. Hi, there. How are you? -Hey, Paul.
[Paul] Been a while.
[Ellie] Yep, how you doin'? That baby sleeping yet?
translation.ko: 그래, 잘 지냈어? 아기는 이제 잘 자나?

translation.en: Uh, not really. No.
[chuckles] No. Well, you'll miss those days when they're gone.
Ah, I find that hard to believe.
[Ellie] Believe it. Babies are pure love.
translation.ko: 믿어도 돼 아기는 사랑 그 자체니까

translation.en: They grow into teenagers, who grow into be assassins of happiness.
translation.ko: 그러다 십 대가 되면 행복의 암살자가 되지

translation.en: Thank you, thank you.
Mm, well, somethin' to look forward to. [chuckles]
Sorry. It's been a rough day.
Year. Couple of years.
Hmm. Your boy still havin' a hard time?
He hates me.
It's not his fault. He's… he's just dealing.
translation.ko: 애 잘못은 아니지 걔도 적응하는 중이니까

translation.en: It's fine. We'll be fine. It's good. Good, good, good.
I wish I knew what I was doin' wrong.
You're not doin' anything wrong.
Sorry. [laughs]
-I'm sorry. -[laughing] Sorry, you scared me.
-I was eavesdropping. I'm sorry. -Yeah.
[chuckles] You're right, though. Teenage boys are horrible.
It's like living with a urinal cake that yells at you.
translation.ko: 소리를 꽥꽥 지르는 소변기 탈취제 같달까요?

translation.en: Mothers are usually the ones who take the hit.
Yeah.
-But I'll tell you somethin'. -Mmm?
Boys always come back for their mamas.
That's nice.
It sounds like you're speaking from experience.
I am.
You have a good mom?
-[Adam] I do. -Oh.
[whispers] I have the best mom.
Good.
I hope you're right.
I'm still researching boarding schools in Fallujah, so…
-Good. -[both laugh]
No, I don't mean that. He's such a sweet kid.
I'm crazy about him.
We lost his dad in a car accident year before last.
Yeah. That's tough.
Yeah. You have no idea.
Well, I have some idea.
-Oh, sorry. -Sorry.
Jinx.
-Thank you. -[Adam] Thank you.
Aren't you grieving too?
-Yeah. -[Adam] Yeah.
I am. Of course I am.
So tell him.
You should tell him.
I don't think he needs it.
You think you're being strong for him,
and the problem with acting like you have it all together is…
translation.ko: 아무렇지 않은 것처럼 행동하는 것의 문제는

translation.en: he believes it.
Maybe he needs to know that you don't.
translation.ko: 괜찮지 않다는 걸 그 아이도 알아야 해요

translation.en: It's okay if you don't.
My husband had a jacket just like that.
Oh, this is a classic.
Yeah.
It was really nice chatting with you. I'll see you later.
translation.ko: 얘기할 수 있어서 즐거웠어요 나중에 또 뵙죠

translation.en: Oh, hey, um…
he doesn't hate you.
He loves you.
More than he knows.
Hey! Hey!
Locked and docked.
Start the area scans for his jet. Let's find him and get the hell outta here.
translation.ko: 근처 스캔해서 제트기 찾아 놈을 찾아서 빨리 뜰 거야

translation.en: Find him.
-So you came back for your wife, Laura? -We're not getting into that.
translation.ko: - 로라를 찾으러 온 거죠? - 그 얘긴 하지 말자

translation.en: Hey, she's my wife too.
-You know what? We should get into that. -Thank you.
Met in the academy.
She was 20 minutes late to the wrong classroom
in the wrong building.
I offered to walk her to the right one, and…
man, I was all in before we even made it outside.
translation.ko: 건물 밖으로 나가기도 전에 푹 빠져버렸어

translation.en: A couple of years ago, she didn't come back from a jump.
translation.ko: 2년 전, 로라는 점프 후에 돌아오지 못했어

translation.en: They told me her jet broke up on reentry, but she was the best pilot in the program.
translation.ko: 재진입 때 제트기가 고장 났다는데 로라의 조종 실력은 최고거든

translation.en: She wrote the book on reentry. Didn't make sense.
And you were trying to get to 2018 'cause that's where she went before?
Yeah.
-What was she doing there? -I don't know.
They changed the jump logs.
Somebody was hidin' somethin'.
Maybe she saw something Sorian didn't want her to see.
translation.ko: 소리언이 은폐하려던 걸 알아냈을 수도 있어

translation.en: Wait, "Sorian"? Maya Sorian, Dad's partner?
-She was always so nice to me. -Hmm.
Yeah, trust me. She's no friend.
translation.ko: 내 말 들어, 좋은 사람 아니야

translation.en: Nope.
After Dad died, she got rich off of his tech.
translation.ko: 아빠가 죽고 나서 아빠 기술로 돈을 벌고

translation.en: Bought all the right people.
Next thing you know,
she has exclusive control over the most valuable resource on Earth,
translation.ko: 지금은 지구에서 가장 값진 자원을 혼자서 통제하고 있지

translation.en: time.
Wait a minute. You're saying Dad invented time travel?
translation.ko: 잠깐만요, 우리 아빠가 시간 여행을 만들었다고요?

translation.en: Yeah. Not on purpose.
The magnetic particle accelerator. Remember that?
He called it The Adam Project.
[Adam] Yeah, or as I like to call it, his favorite child.
So what happened to Laura?
Mmm. Well, I think your nice friend Maya had her killed.
translation.ko: 네가 그리도 좋아하는 마야가 죽인 것 같아

translation.en: -What? -Yeah.
That's why I gotta get back to 2018 as soon as possible.
The jet's almost ready. I'll lay low in the shed.
I'll heal for a few more days until I can get a clean read
and then fly out of your life.
But going back to save her. -Talking to me. -[whines]
translation.ko: 하지만 시간 여행을 하고 저랑 이렇게 얘기하고

translation.en: Everything you're doing right now just to rescue one person.
translation.ko: 한 사람을 구하겠다고 이 모든 일을 하는 거잖아요

translation.en: You're changing the future. That's gotta be against the rules.
translation.ko: 미래를 바꾸는 일인데 규칙을 어기는 거 아니에요?

translation.en: You'll feel differently when you meet her.
-And when you lose her. -What?
[shushes] Grab that bag. Get ready to run.
translation.ko: 왜 그래요? 가방 들고 도망칠 준비 해라

translation.en: Why? What's happening?
We're going that way. Be ready.
-Move! -[whooshing]
Stay behind me. [exhales]
Don't you do it! Don't you do it, Reed!
Wanna see something cool?
-That's a lightsaber, dude. -Quiet now.
Time to go. Let's go.
[Sorian] Hello, Adam.
[man] Reed, don't move!
[Adam] Christos. They'll let anyone into this time stream.
translation.ko: - 꼼짝 마! - 크리스토스? 사람 안 가리고 막 데려왔네

translation.en: Who's that?
That's Christos. We were in the academy together.
He's a decent pilot but a terrible person.
He runs security for Sorian.
Ouchie, with the face. Did I do that?
God, I hope the boss lets me kill you.
[chuckles] In fairness, though, you did shoot me first.
On the bright side, your… your face now matches your soul.
translation.ko: 이제 얼굴이랑 영혼이 짝짜꿍이니까 좋게 생각해

translation.en: -Anyone say you talk too much? -All the time.
-It's come up. -[Sorian] That's enough.
Adam, before this goes any further, let's just go home, please.
translation.ko: 애덤, 일 키우지 말고 제발 집으로 돌아가자

translation.en: Uh, no! Just… just no.
So you're risking your own young life
over some paranoid delusion that I somehow killed Laura.
translation.ko: 내가 로라를 죽였을 거라는 망상 때문이니?

translation.en: I loved Laura. You were both like family to me.
translation.ko: 난 로라를 사랑했어 너희 둘 다 내 가족이야

translation.en: I would never have hurt her. I hate that it's come to this.
translation.ko: 내가 왜 걔를 해치니? 이 상황이 참 개탄스럽구나

translation.en: Guns.
Christos, please escort Adam back to 2050.
-You're up. -Yeah. All right, drop the Mag-Cyl.
-This? -Yeah.
-Yeah. Okay. -All right.
Wanna start low or go high?
-[young Adam] Stop! Get off him! -[Adam groans]
-[guns power up] -[Christos] Come here!
-Move! -♪ I was told what it means ♪
-What is happening? -Dying outside your fixed time is messy.
translation.ko: 이건 또 뭐예요? 남의 시간대에서 죽으면 곱게 못 죽어

translation.en: -What are you doing here? -Saving your ass, honey. Behind you!
translation.ko: - 당신이 왜 여기 있어? - 구하러 왔지, 뒤 조심!

translation.en: I can't believe…
-I can't believe you're here. -♪ Good times, bad times ♪
-Hey. -Hi.
That was awesome.
-We should go. -Yep. Let's go. Come on, come on, come on!
Go. Go!
I knew you'd come someday. I just didn't know when.
translation.ko: 언제인지는 몰라도 당신이 올 줄 알았어

translation.en: [Adam] Of course I came.
[young Adam] Eyes on the road, please.
[Adam] They said you lit up on reentry.
That's crap. I have the top reentry stats in the program.
translation.ko: 헛소리야, 나보다 조종 잘하는 사람이 어딨다고

translation.en: -Oh yeah. -[young Adam coughing]
Laura, this is… me.
-Hi. -Parallel contact, babe?
Well, you've always said that you wished you'd met me earlier.
translation.ko: 어릴 적의 나를 만나보고 싶다고 했었잖아

translation.en: -Here I am. -Yeah.

translation.ko: 왜 왔다고 생각하는데요? 한번 안아보자고 왔겠어요?

translation.en: -There's a reason I need to talk to you. -I don't-- I don't care.
-He doesn't care. -Don't get me wrong.
I'm very happy to see you, and I mean this in the best possible way,
translation.ko: 너희가 진심으로 반갑고 악의 없이 하는 말인데

translation.en: but you need to piss off to where you came from.
translation.ko: 너희들이 온 시간대로 당장 썩 꺼져줬으면 해

translation.en: Anything you say or do could cause a divergence.
translation.ko: 네가 하는 말과 행동이 발산을 초래하게 돼

translation.en: Can you please shut up for a second?
-I'm not gonna listen-- -For a second and listen.
translation.ko: - 들을 것도 없이… - 내 말 좀 들어봐요

translation.en: -Shut the physics fountain in your face. -What you are doing is reckless.
[young Adam] You okay?
-God damn it! -[groaning]
-[Adam] In fairness, I-- -It's okay. I asked him nicely to shut up and listen.
translation.ko: 난 분명히 입 닥치고 말 들으라고 정중히 말했는데

translation.en: -He did no such thing, so… -It's okay. It's fine. I'm fine.
That's what you get. We don't hit people in this family.
translation.ko: 벌받은 기분이 어때? 우리 가족은 사람 안 때려

translation.en: What was that?
-That's what you get. -God!
How did you turn out to be an asshole? I thought you loved me.
translation.ko: 왜 밥맛으로 자란 거야? 날 사랑하는 줄 알았는데

translation.en: -I do! -None of it matters anymore.
-Are you kidding me? Of course it matters. -Dad.
translation.ko: 상관없긴, 이건 심각한 문제야 - 아빠 - 상관없다니

translation.en: They don't have safeguards where you come from? -Dad. -Protocols?
translation.ko: 미래에는 안전 수칙이나 규정 같은 것도 없나?

translation.en: -Maya and I agreed. -Dad.
-There'd be an ethics panel-- -Dad!
With real oversight.
None of it matters anymore.
Wait. It already happened? Somebody already altered time?
translation.ko: 설마 이미 일어났어? 누가 시간을 건드린 거야?

translation.en: -Who? -Sorian.
-Maya? -Maya.
She'd never do that. She knows the consequences.
translation.ko: 그럴 사람이 아니야 어떤 결과를 초래할지 알거든

translation.en: -She's been funding my work for years. -The Adam Project.
translation.ko: - 내 연구를 수년간 후원했는데 - 애덤 프로젝트요?

translation.en: Yes, I theorized that with a powerful enough pulse,
translation.ko: 그래, 강력한 펄스로 우주에 실용적인 웜홀을

translation.en: we could generate utilitarian wormholes in space.
And we did it four weeks ago.
But I was… I was just playing with the theory
translation.ko: 시간 여행에 웜홀을 활용할 수 있다는 이론을

translation.en: that you can use wormholes for time travel.
That part's theoretical.
-Right. -Still theoretical.
This theory needs to take a leak. So let's go.
Holy shit! I'm the godfather of time travel?
translation.ko: 잠깐, 설마! 내가 시간 여행의 창시자야?

translation.en: Nice hit, Dad.
[whispers] I think I broke my hand.
[Louis] I'm… I'm sorry. This is my fault.
My… my ego. My hubris.
My need to be best, to be first, to be the smartest guy in the room.
translation.ko: 최고여야 하고, 최초여야 하고 제일 똑똑해야 성이 풀려서

translation.en: And here we are.
-A disgusting character flaw. -He didn't know.
-[Louis] But I should have. -Yeah.
Mankind has no business tampering with the mechanics of the universe.
translation.ko: 인류는 우주의 이치를 간섭하려 들어선 안 되거든

translation.en: There are forces greater than science.
Right. That's why we're gonna put the genie back in the bottle.
translation.ko: 맞아요, 이제 지니를 요술 램프에 다시 넣어야죠

translation.en: Destroy time travel before it's even invented.
translation.ko: 시간 여행이 생기기도 전에 싹을 자르는 거예요

translation.en: What's done, no matter how terrible,
translation.ko: 이미 일어난 일은 아무리 끔찍하다고 해도

translation.en: should not and cannot be undone under any circumstance.
translation.ko: 되돌리는 게 불가능하고 그렇게 해서도 안 돼

translation.en: Even us being here, talking like this, we're perverting fate and time.
translation.ko: 우리가 이렇게 만난 것도 운명과 시간을 더럽히는 행위야

translation.en: I told you Sorian already did that. She's had the world by the balls since.
translation.ko: 소리언은 이미 했다니까요 세계를 손안에 넣었다고요

translation.en: And you know that for a fact?
Do you have scientific proof that she changed things?
translation.ko: 시간을 건드렸다는 과학적 증거가 있냐는 말이다

translation.en: No, you don't because you can't know. But I will tell you this.
translation.ko: 없지, 그건 알 수 없거든 하지만 이건 확실해

translation.en: You being here opens up the potential for catastrophic reconfiguration.
translation.ko: 네가 여기 와서 세상을 바꾸면 재앙으로 이어질 수도 있어

translation.en: -And that is quantifiable, that-- -Stop. Stop.
-Stop. -Stop what?
-Stop being a scientist. -But I am a scient--
Be a father.
You were always more interested in the universe than your son.
translation.ko: 늘 아들보다 우주에 더 관심 가지잖아요

translation.en: -That's not true. -[Adam] That is true.
And when you're older, you'll realize that. It--
You know what? It's…
That ship has sailed. It's too late for me. So, you know, whatever. I'm fine.
translation.ko: 난 기차 떠났어요 이미 늦었으니까 뭐… 난 괜찮지만

translation.en: But he needs you.
And you? What do you need?
I need to go for a walk.
I can't be here, Adam. I… I have to go.
translation.ko: 난 여기 있으면 안 돼, 가야겠다

translation.en: -Please don't go. -I have to.
-Please. -This is… this is bigger than any of us.
It's too dangerous what he's asking me to do. I can't.
All right. We'll see each other again.
Wait.
-I need to tell you something. -No, you can't say anything else to me.
translation.ko: - 할 말이 있어요 - 아니, 더는 얘기해선 안 돼

translation.en: I can't know the future.
I'm sorry.
I have to go home. Your mom and you are waiting.
translation.ko: 집에 가야 해 엄마랑 네가 기다리고 있어

translation.en: [woman] Yes, Senator.
Except the stability of these wormholes is no longer a hypothetical,
translation.ko: 웜홀의 안정성은 더 이상 가설이 아닌 데다가

translation.en: and the work we are doing here is simply ahead of the current statutes.
translation.ko: 우리가 하는 일의 범주가 현행법을 초월하고 있어요

translation.en: So you can either support my program and be a part of the future,
translation.ko: 그러니 제 사업을 후원하고 미래로 같이 나아가시든가

translation.en: or you can get left behind in the past.
[Sorian] Hang up the phone.
What are you doing here? You said I wouldn't be seeing you again.
translation.ko: 여긴 왜 나타났어? 다시는 볼 일 없다고 했잖아

translation.en: Did I? Hmm.
When was that? Remind me.
[Maya] The last time you just showed up, two months ago.
translation.ko: 지난번에 왔을 때니 두 달 전이지

translation.en: Oh, well, for me, it was 32 years ago.
So sorry if I'm a little fuzzy on the details.
Anyway, times have changed.
You can't be here.
You know the potential for catastrophic changes to the time stream.
translation.ko: 시간의 흐름에 미치는 변화는 재앙으로 이어진다는 거 알잖아

translation.en: -It's incalculable. -God, I was such a nerd.
Will you please just stop talking?
Everything you asked me to do.
The stock buys, the offshore accounts, all of it. It's unethical.
translation.ko: 주식 매수며, 해외 계좌며 모두 비윤리적이야

translation.en: -And illegal. -This isn't a joke. It's dangerous.
The environmental impact alone from the companies you had me pick
translation.ko: 네가 고른 기업들이 환경에 끼치는 피해만으로도

translation.en: could be devastating.
In fairness to us,
the environment was pretty much toast before we came along.
translation.ko: 짚고 넘어가자면 우리가 나타나기 전에도 환경은 개판이었어

translation.en: And by the way, Maya, you did it, all of it,
translation.ko: 그리고, 마야 넌 이 모든 걸 해냈어

translation.en: because somewhere inside that cheap suit and ridiculous ponytail is me.
translation.ko: 왜냐면 그 싸구려 정장과 우스꽝스러운 머리 안 어딘가에 내가 있기 때문이겠지

translation.en: I'm leaving.
Where you going?
You seeing someone?
No, you're not. You're too busy.
translation.ko: 말도 안 돼, 할 일 많잖아

translation.en: [clicks tongue] Thing is, you always will be.
This company is all you will ever have.
-[sighs] -It is your personal life.
It's your family.
But this is our legacy.
And if we had let the government take it from us,
then everything we sacrificed,
all that loneliness,
all that loneliness,
would've been for nothing.
And I did it.
I fixed that future where we had been forgotten.
Then why are you back here now?
I'm back
because we can't control time travel if it never existed.
translation.ko: 시간 여행이 없어지는 걸 막아야 하기 때문이지

translation.en: And your buddy Adam Reed is about to betray you.
translation.ko: 네 친구 애덤 리드가 널 배신할 거야

translation.en: Adam? He's just a little kid.
Yeah, well, that little kid…
[laughs] …he grows up to be a very big pain in our ass.
[sighs] Trust me. You're gonna want this.
What?
I know you think you know more than me because you're older.
translation.ko: 아저씨는 나이가 많으니까 나보다 똑똑한 줄 알죠?

translation.en: Go away, Adam. [sighs]
And I know why you hate him so much.
Really?
[laughs] Well, do tell. I'm on the edge of my seat here.
translation.ko: 그래, 들어나 보자 아주 궁금해서 미치겠네

translation.en: Holy shit. I wonder what it i-- Was it because he's narcissistic,
translation.ko: 이야, 무슨 말을 하려나? 아빠가 자기밖에 몰라서?

translation.en: or, uh, never came home from work or cared more about his job than his son--
translation.ko: 아니면 집에 오질 않아서? 아들보다 일을 더 사랑해서…

translation.en: It's because he died.
You hate him
because he died.
You made yourself hate him
because it was easier than missing him.
And I remember some stuff that you maybe don't wanna.
translation.ko: 아저씨는 기억하기 싫겠지만 저는 기억하는 게 있어요

translation.en: Oh yeah?
Like what?
He played catch with us almost every night.
translation.ko: 아빠는 거의 매일 밤 캐치볼을 해줬어요

translation.en: Catch.
He'd get home from work,
be so tired, and I'd be in the yard throwing the ball against the pitch back.
translation.ko: 많이 피곤해하셨고 저는 마당에서 투수망에 공을 던지고 있었죠

translation.en: -You remember the pitch back, right? -Oh, I… I remember the pitch back.
Yeah, he bought it so he didn't have to play with me.
translation.ko: 아빠가 못 놀아주니까 대신 사준 거잖아

translation.en: Nope.
He bought it because they had one in the window of Altman's.
translation.ko: 백화점 앞 창문에 전시되어 있어서 사준 거예요

translation.en: And every time we passed that store,
I begged him to buy it for me,
so that's what Dad did.
He'd see me throwin' in the yard, and no matter how tired he was,
translation.ko: 마당에서 공 던지는 저를 보시면 아무리 피곤해도

translation.en: he'd always grab his mitt to come out for a catch.
Things happened to you, to us.
translation.ko: 아저씨는, 우리는 안 좋은 일을 겪었고

translation.en: And we suck at dealing with it.
I'm starting to think it's something we do.
I give Mom a hard time now, and…
I think…
I think it's easier to be angry than it is to be sad.
translation.ko: 속상한 것보다 화내는 게 쉬운가 봐요

translation.en: And I guess, when I get older,
I forget that there's a difference.
How'd you get to be so smart?
How'd you get to be so dumb?
Nice try, asshole.
[Ellie] Adam, make sure you feed Hawking before you leave for school, honey.
translation.ko: 애덤, 학교 가기 전에 호킹 밥 주는 거 잊지 마

translation.en: -You're still here. -[Louis] Oh.
And you're cooking. What are you making? Hi.
Uh, I know you like the Denver omelet.
That's not a Denver omelet. That is a cry for help.
translation.ko: 그건 덴버 오믈렛이 아니야 구조 요청이지!

translation.en: The eggs are burnt, and the bacon's still somehow totally raw.
translation.ko: 달걀은 탔는데 베이컨은 왜 익지를 않지?

translation.en: Oh, you… Oh, no, no. No, no, no. Wha--
Do you wanna talk about why you're still here
instead of being at work?
I… I… Well, I just wanted to stay home with you today.
You don't say. I like this guy.
translation.ko: 꿈이야, 생시야? 이 남자 맘에 드네

translation.en: This guy likes you.
What's going on with you, honey?
Does he seem, uh… does he seem sad to you?
No.
He's an odd duck, like his dad.
I happen to collect odd ducks.
I don't know if I should've built that game for him.
translation.ko: 저 게임기를 만들어 주는 게 아니었어

translation.en: Shouldn't he be outside, playing with the rest of the kids?
How is he gonna find his place in the world?
"His place in the world"? He's a kid. We're his place in the world.
translation.ko: 둥지라니, 아직 애잖아 우리가 애덤의 둥지야

translation.en: You're his place in the world.
[sighs] Okay, whatever is going on, listen, I can tell you the truth
translation.ko: 왜 이러는지 모르겠지만 내가 팩폭을 날려줄 수도 있고

translation.en: or something that's gonna make you feel better.
translation.ko: 듣기 좋은 말을 해줄 수도 있어

translation.en: I'd rather cut to it and tell you the truth, if you're up for it.
I… I'd rather something that'll make me feel better.
translation.ko: 난 듣기 좋은 말을 해줬으면 좋겠는데

translation.en: [laughs] Yeah, I know.
Kidding. Sort of. Okay, tell me.
When you are with us… [clicks tongue]
…you're with us 100%.
It's amazing.
And when you're not… [laughs] …it's like… pfft.
So is he a little lonely?
Yeah, probably.
But does that make you a shitty guy? No.
translation.ko: 그렇다고 당신이 나쁜 아빠인 건 아냐

translation.en: I've gotta do better.
Hey, buddy, I have good news for you.
He doesn't need perfect. He just needs you.
translation.ko: 애덤은 완벽한 아빠가 아니라 당신이 필요해

translation.en: Your cooking makes you a borderline serial killer,
translation.ko: 요리 실력만 보면 연쇄 살인마 후보지만

translation.en: but the rest of you is pretty awesome.
Ellie.
You know I love you.
Yeah, I know.
I'm extremely lovable.
Yeah.
I have to go to work.
Okay, okay, okay.
-And, hey, you got time. -[sighs]
"It's later than you think."
[young Adam] Really think we can?
Maybe, maybe not. We'll see.
But we're gonna try anyway.
Destroy time travel. How will we do that?
translation.ko: 시간 여행을 파괴하려면 어떻게 해야 하죠?

translation.en: This is the world's largest electromagnetic accelerator.
It's 2018, so EM technology isn't stable yet.
So here's what we're gonna do. We're gonna blow this bitch up.
translation.ko: 그래서 어떡할 거냐면 녀석을 터뜨려 버릴 거야

translation.en: -Blow it up? -Yep.
How did I live this long? That's a terrible idea.
translation.ko: 구린 계획인데요? 요절 안 한 게 신기하네요

translation.en: Yeah, well, when a bad idea is the only idea, it becomes a great idea.
translation.ko: 구린 계획이 유일한 계획일 때 좋은 계획이 되는 법이지

translation.en: Who said that?
You. Nine years from now, right before you get arrested.
translation.ko: 너, 9년 뒤 체포되기 직전에 하는 말이지

translation.en: -What? -Try to focus.
We'll have to deal with security. You know this bag of toys you love?
translation.ko: 경비부터 처리해야 돼 내 장난감 가방 좋아하지?

translation.en: Yeah.
Being a geek is about to pay off.
-Reading me? -[young Adam] Roger that, Red Leader.
This is Butternut Sippy Cup. Ten-four, over.
translation.ko: 여기는 버터넛 시피 컵 잘 들린다, 오버

translation.en: Let's just talk like normal people, okay?
[young Adam] Copy that…
Red Leader.
Somethin's wrong.
There's nobody here.
Which means they're here.
Sorian warned her younger self we were coming.
translation.ko: 미래의 소리언이 현재의 소리언에게 알린 거야

translation.en: Are you sure?
Oh, pretty sure.
-Don't move. On your knees. -I'm sorry. What?
translation.ko: 꼼짝 말고 무릎 꿇어 뭐라고 했어?

translation.en: We're taking you back to 2050, Reed.
I can't hear you through the helmet. It muffles a bit. It's hard to hear you.
translation.ko: 헬멧 때문에 안 들려 소리를 먹어서 안 들리네

translation.en: Don't get me wrong, your outfits are incredible though.
They're intimidating but also scream, "Please don't hurt me."
[soldier] On your knees. I won't tell you again.
Well, you… you're right about that.
Adam, what are you doing? I'm about to get my ass kicked.
translation.ko: 애덤, 뭐 하고 있어? 나 처맞기 일보 직전이야

translation.en: Don't worry. He doesn't wanna fight.
They wanna fight. They really, really wanna fight.
Just look him in the eyes and smile.
Smile in a way that says, "I want this."
"I've been waiting my whole life for this."
translation.ko: 평생 이 순간을 기다려 왔다는 듯이

translation.en: Then hit him in the private bathing suit parts.
translation.ko: 그다음 무릎 꿇고 사타구니 부위를 때려요

translation.en: -Adam! -Roger that.
Yeah!
Adam, you're on those cars, right?
Roger that, middle-aged Adam.
Bye. Pfft.
Adam!
That was invigorating!
-Dad? -Dad?
-I'm sorry. Are you okay? -This close!
-That was amazing. -This close!
-Where's little Adam? -He's fine!
-Hey, hey! -Hey?
That's your mother's car.
The car?
What are you doin' here?
I went to the motel, and when I didn't find you there,
I… I figured I'd find you here.
It's not like you're keeping a low profile, obviously.
What the hell is this?
Tell you what? You come up with a plan, and we'll do it your way. Sound good?
translation.ko: 이봐요, 그럼 이렇게 합시다 아빠가 계획을 짜면 그대로 할게요, 좋죠?

translation.en: Oh God. Thank God. There's a plan.
I was beginning to think you were making this up as you went along.
translation.ko: 기분 내키는 대로 저지르는 줄 알고 걱정했잖아

translation.en: Adam, I'm goin' inside. Cover the perimeter.
-No one gets in behind me. -Sorry. That was harsh.
translation.ko: - 아무도 들여보내지 마 - 미안해, 좀 심했지?

translation.en: Roger Dodger.
[Adam] Harsh? You shaved my ass with a Subaru.
I… I saved your ass with a Subaru, son.
What's Dad doing?
-Dad's being critical. Big surprise. -Okay, I--
You're trying to break into a highly sensitive, secure facility
translation.ko: 넌 지금 극도로 위험한 철통 보안 시설을

translation.en: with a sixth-grader. I am not being critical. I'm… I'm narrating.
translation.ko: 6학년짜리랑 침입하고 있어 이건 딴지가 아니라 서술이야

translation.en: Will you just stop? Stop. Where the hell are you going?
translation.ko: 잠깐 멈춰봐 대체 어디 가는 거야?

translation.en: To destroy your accelerator, and I'm gonna enjoy it.
translation.ko: 아빠 액셀러레이터를 신나게 박살 내러 가요

translation.en: Do you realize that you have broken every rule?
translation.ko: 네가 모든 규칙을 어겼다는 건 알아?

translation.en: You've blown past every conceivable ethical boundary like it wasn't there.
translation.ko: 윤리적 선이 존재하지 않는 것처럼 제멋대로 굴고 있잖아

translation.en: Yeah? Then why are you here, Dad?
Because you can't do it without me.
Some people dream of the future.
Here at Sorian Technologies, we're building it.
[Louis] If you destroy the accelerator, Sorian will simply rebuild it.
translation.ko: 액셀러레이터를 없애 봤자 소리언이 다시 만들 거야

translation.en: -[Adam] So what will work? -[Louis] What you're after is ISPCA.
Infinitely Shifting Plasma Containing Algorithm,

translation.en: How do you destroy math?

translation.en: so it lives here in the old bean,

translation.ko: 지하 2층에 있는 뇌신경 프로세서에만 들어 있어

translation.en: Are you talking about your penis?
Can… can we be serious now?
Yes. No. Yes.
-It's a hard drive, okay? -[chuckles]
-God, you're such a child. -Sorry.
There is a crystal hard drive running the algorithm in a closed loop.
translation.ko: 크리스털 하드 드라이브가 알고리듬을 자동 실행 중이야

translation.en: That is the nerve center of the accelerator.
translation.ko: 그게 액셀러레이터의 중추라고 할 수 있지

translation.en: So we go there, destroy the hard drive, prevent time travel from being invented.
translation.ko: 거기 가서 드라이브를 없애면 시간 여행 발명을 막는 거네요

translation.en: Theoretically, time travel--
Oh my God! You're killing me with the theoretical.
translation.ko: 이론 어쩌고 하는 것 때문에 미칠 것 같아요!

translation.en: -Yes, that should do it. -Good. Let's do that.
translation.ko: - 그래, 그러면 끝이야 - 그럼 하러 가죠

translation.en: -Okay. Okay. -Okay. Okay.
-This is where you work. -Yes.

-[Adam] So this is it? -[Louis] This is it.
I gotta hand it to you, Dad. You were not messin' around.
translation.ko: 대단해요, 아빠 회사에서 놀았던 게 아니네요

translation.en: This is where we house the hard drive.

translation.ko: - 꺼내면 어떻게 돼요? - 둘 중 하나야

translation.en: The accelerator will continue to run on a dormant loop.

translation.ko: 알고리듬이 없으니 아무도 프로그램화할 수 없게 돼

translation.en: Or?
Or there's a cataclysmic meltdown

translation.ko: 반경 160km 내의 모든 생명체가 죽게 돼

translation.en: Well, let's hope it's the first thing.

translation.en: Screw it.
[Maya] Louis.
[Louis] Maya?

The only thing that's changed is you. Have you lost your mind?
All these years, I funded your work.
I'm not the villain here. I spent millions--
Hundreds of millions of my money, my wealth.
translation.ko: 수억 달러야, 그것도 내 돈! 내 재산을 바쳐서 당신 뜻대로 하게 해줬어

translation.en: -Mmm. -Just to fund your every indulgence.
translation.ko: 내 재산을 바쳐서 당신 뜻대로 하게 해줬어

translation.en: But this…
this is mine to do with as I please.

translation.en: Now,
Adam,
give me… the drive.
No.
Just… no.
I thought you were gonna say that.
Come here.
Gimme the gun.
Maya, Jesus Christ.
What are you doing? Are you crazy?
Oh, I think that's well established.
Adam, just listen to her.
It's okay. It's all right.
'Cause Adam's gonna give me the drive right now.

-Adam? -Adam?

♪ I don't want no more ♪

Seven.

Would you do that?

Yeah.
Holy shit.
What?

translation.en: -Are we gonna smoke this banana or sit-- -Play ball!

translation.en: by Newton's gravitational formula.
F is equal to big G, Newton's gravitational constant,

translation.en: -And r-- -Can you believe this guy?

-Cool, right? -Yeah. -Yeah. -Super cool. [chuckles]
